title: Meditation: Saying Yes to Life (2018-07-25)
itunes:title: Meditation: Saying Yes to Life
description: Meditation: Saying Yes to Life (2018-07-25) - We are conditioned to scan for “what’s wrong" and contract our body and mind in anticipation of danger. This meditation helps us undo these primal survival habits, and frees us to inhabit the full aliveness, creativity and love our natural being.
